title: Dinosaur National Monument: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations       Permits Certain activities within the monument require a permit. Here you can find out the requirements to obtain a boating permit, backcountry camping permit, special use permit (such as for a wedding), or a permit for commercial photography. If you have any questions about whether a permit is needed, please contact us. Reservations You can obtain reservations for campsites at the Green River Campground, Split Mountain Group Campground and the group site at the Echo Park Campground. Reservations are also taken for the Ely Creek backcountry campsites on the Jones Hole Trail. All other campgrounds and backcountry areas are first come, first served.
